alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland, southern Golden Valley and northeastern Sweet Grass Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 600 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deadmans Basin Reservoir, or 23 miles southeast of Harlowton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall. Rainfall rates 2 to 4 inches per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized ponding or flooding. Be prepared for reduced visibility in heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Ryegate, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Franklin and Shawmut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
